messages.content: ComfyQR is a set of ComfyUI nodes designed for creating dynamic QR image layers for generative QR art without leaving the web UI.
What are the input parameters for the QR Code and QR Code (Split) nodes?
The input parameters for the QR Code and QR Code (Split) nodes include protocol, text, module_size, max_image_size, fill_hexcolor, back_hexcolor, error_correction, and border.
What is the purpose of the QR Code (Conformed to Image Size) node?
The QR Code (Conformed to Image Size) node creates a QR code fixed to specific output dimensions through image resampling.
What does the Mask QR Errors node do?
The Mask QR Errors node analyzes the differences between a modified QR and creates a mask of the estimated errors.
What are the additional module styles supported by the QR generation nodes?
Additional module styles include Square, Gapped Square, Circle, Rounded, Vertical bars, and Horizontal bars.
Is ComfyQR compatible with the ComfyQR-scanning-nodes project?
Yes, the ComfyQR project is compatible with the ComfyQR-scanning-nodes project for additional functionality.
